comments.body: There needs to be a copyright and license header above this.  All controller-side code in ansible is GPLv3+.  You can take a look at another connection plugin (for instance, chroot.py https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/plugins/connection/chroot.py ) for an example.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@# You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
# along with Ansible.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
from __future__ import (absolute_import, division, print_function)
__metaclass__ = type
